articles.title: Türkiye rejects Trump’s bid to expel Palestinians from Gaza
articles.description: Türkiye has reiterated its objection to U.S. President Donald Trump’s proposal to expel Palestinians from their lands to Egypt and Jordan, as Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan described the American leader's approach as "failing to read history properly."
articles.content:
